title: 20% Off Next Purchase
terms: Valid on purchases over $100. Cannot be combined with other offers.

title: Free Shipping Weekend
terms: No minimum purchase required. Valid on all items.

title: Buy One Get One 50% Off
terms: Equal or lesser value item receives discount. In-store only.

title: $50 Off Appliances
terms: Valid on appliances $300 or more. Excludes clearance items.
